means: 给…加插图（ illustrate的过去式和过去分词 ）

sentence.Network_en: His beautifully illustrated book well attested his love of the university.
sentence.Network_cn: 他那本带有精美插图的书见证了他对大学的热爱。

sentence.Network_en: He's just written a book, nicely illustrated and not too technical.
sentence.Network_cn: 他刚写完一本书，插图精美，内容也并不艰涩。

sentence.Network_en: The book is well written, properly illustrated and excellently captioned.
sentence.Network_cn: 这本书写得很好，插图生动形象，说明文字简练精辟。

PerfectNetExp.abs: You can write and edit an illustrated composition on your personal computer ., 你可以在你个人用的计算机上写或编一篇带插图的作文.
illustrated catalog and sales data sent a separate letter .带插图的目录和销售资料另函寄出。
it was published in illustrated parts .分册出版时附有插图。
不切实际的希望 illusory hopes画报，画刊 illustrated卓越的 illustrious

list.abs: 插画家（illustrator）（Illustrator）就是以绘画插画为职业的人，主要工作包括替书籍、杂志、报纸、说明书、小说、教科书等刊物绘制插画、封面…
心脏：解剖插图 ... 房间隔 - Septum interatriale 插画 - Illustrations 摄影 - Photos.
朗文英汉双解词典 - china-pub网上书店 ... dictionaryskillsworkbook 词典检索技巧练习 illustrations 插图： airport 机场.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... irrevocable 不可取消的 illustrate 说明，阐明 illuminate 照亮；使明白.
英语常见词根前缀后缀大全 ... illiberal 吝啬的，粗鄙的 illustrate 举例说明，图解 illuminate 照明.

entry.def: If you say that something illustrates a situation that you are drawing attention to, you mean that it shows that the situation exists.

example.ex: The example of the United States illustrates this point...
example.tran: 美国的例子证明了这一点。

example.ex: This change is neatly illustrated by what has happened to the Arab League...
example.tran: 这种变化鲜明地体现在阿拉伯联盟所发生的事件上。

entry.tran: (用例子、故事或图表)说明,阐明
entry.def: If you use an example, story, or diagram to illustrate a point, you use it show that what you are saying is true or to make your meaning clearer.

example.ex: Let me give another example to illustrate this difficult point...
example.tran: 我再举个例子来说明这个难点。

example.ex: Throughout, she illustrates her analysis with excerpts from discussions.
example.tran: 自始至终,她摘引讨论内容来阐明她的分析。

entry.def: If you illustrate a book, you put pictures, photographs or diagrams into it.

example.ex: She went on to art school and is now illustrating a book...
example.tran: 她后来读了艺术学校,现在正在为一本书画插图。

example.ex: He has illustrated the book with black-and-white photographs.
example.tran: 他为那本书配了一些黑白照片插图。

auth_sentence.content: One patient I spent time with illustrated the challenges.
auth_sentence.res_content: One patient I spent time with illustrated the challenges.
